job description:
Job Description: Data Visualization Analyst

Role Overview:
The Data Visualization Analyst will be working on a variety of projects in the areas business intelligence and data analytics using Spotfire and other reporting tools. The ideal candidate is a creative developer that can think outside of the box, enjoys challenging projects in a fast paced industry. Participates in visualization design, development, ongoing support, and delivery activities related to data services. Provides expertise on dashboard and reporting solutions across site.

Responsibilities:
  • Work as integral member of cross-functional team to gather and document requirements to meet business needs.
  • Design, develop and test reports and dashboards that utilize underlying data warehouse and import files.
  • Prepare comprehensive documentation and ensures timely completion of assigned work.
  • Develop standard solutions and escalates with proper documentation when necessary.
  • Collaborates with the business stakeholders to learn the aspects of the business and develop analytic insight.
  • Analyzes application requirements and provides recommended design
  • Collaborate with IT team to develop and recommend changes on Data Analytic and Business Intelligence strategic roadmap
Qualifications and Skills:
  • Bachelor Degree preferably in MIS, Computer Science, Mathematics or related field with 4 – 5 years Business Intelligence experience.
  • 4 – 5 years' experience with reporting and / or visualization tool (e.g. Tableau, Tibco Spotfire, Crystal Report, Microsoft Report, SSRS etc.)
  • Experience administrating, developing and implementing reports and dashboards.
  • Strong knowledge of data warehousing concepts with working SQL and Big data experience,
  • Experience with multiple interactive reporting tools
  • Experience in programing and coding e.g. VBA,.Net application, Visual Studio, Python
  • Front end development (GUI interfaces) utilizing ODBC to connect to any Open Architecture RDBMS (Relational Database Management Systems) – such as Oracle and Sybase
  • Experience with designing Data Warehouse architecture, data design and implementation
  • Strong presentation, verbal and written communications skills
